```{r}
library(SRAT)
library(SKAT)
```

```{r}
data(SKAT.example)
attach(SKAT.example)
```

```{r}
obj.skat <- SKAT_Null_Model(y.c ~ X, out_type = "C")
SKAT(Z, obj.skat, weights.beta = c(1, 1))$p.value
```

```{r}
set.seed(123)
obj.srat <- srat.null(y.c, X)
srat.test(Z, obj.srat)
```
